message.body: That would be wonderful. Thank you.
Ok and then for the smash cake im looking for little toys.. at the moment im only seeing bath toys, like those rubber squirters. That would be ok?

Yeah. I only need a small Cake for that. We found out he has a #### ton of allergies to food so it will mainly be for pictures and fun of it. Even if it was just a small version of the cake like just with the colors. I would hate to have you put all this work into for him to literally smash it haha
Ok... I can put a sugar image on the small cake too?
The toy and photo will be the same pricing and both are easy enough to place so whatever one you want
Could you just out a big one?
Put*
Image on just the big one?
Like one that sticks up like a candle would.
Lol im getting confused.... so 3D item on the big cake?
Lol. no. I love the sugar picture for the big cake.
Lol ok... so then a big one messing toy on the smash cake?
Meaning**
Yes. Like even out of rice Krispy treats or something. (Doesn't have to edible)
Lol ok. Let me just figure out this last part (item for smash cake) then ill have the price for you
Awesome. Thanks So Much. Can the sugar thing have Ryan Joseph (if it fits)
Yea ill see if it fits when I order it
Thank you!
That's perfect!!!
Ok cool..
It matches our decorations haha. (I'm way too excited over these guppies)
Ahahaha
We are delivering? And in philly?
Yes Philly. I'm gonna let you know. I think Charlie can pick it up
Ok... its $62 for the big one and $35 for the small one. Total is 102... if we deliver just add $5 so 107.
Okay. Awesome. What about my Mom's?
The big one is a half sheet cake. Half yellow, half chocolate. With the image... and the smash cake is just yellow, 6" round with the big topper
How many people again for your moms?
Ok I can do a single layer half sheet or a 12" round double layered
Half sheet would be fine.
Ok choc or yellow?
Yellow.
Ok.. can draw a big 50 on it like the pic you sent me?
Yeah. Have fun with It.
Lol ok let me consult with my designer (steph) and then ill get back to you shortly with the price
What does your mom like? (Ex: flowers, dog lover, casino goer)
Lol she's not into much Flowers would be pretty.
Ok lol I can work with that
Ok her 's is going to be $56... $61 if delivery in philly
Okay. I'll bring you the money this week
Ok cool... and last thing. I know you said pink, is there a second color she likes so everything isn't pink... like purple or yellow
Purple her decorations and plates etc are pink black purple and some silver in it
Ok got it
Thank you so much! !

Oh let me tell you now so I don't forget. Normally I add cocoa powder to my black icing. Its is easier to dye brown icing black than it is to dye pure white. Plus the cocoa prevents the nasty dye taste since I have to use alot of black. ....
That's fine. What ever you need to do
There is no chocolate in ryans smash cake. But I can either use cocoa for your moms icing and just avoid the black for him or I can not use it all
If you have to use it in Ryans that's fine. He won't really eat much of his smash cake anyway.
Ok... no itll just be on your moms but I know you said he was allergic so just wanted to make you aware
I assume he will just play in the cake haha. Thank you for the warning. I won't let him have any of the icing in my mom's cake.
Can i give you half this week and the rest on the 2nd?
Yup that's no problem
